scripts.install:lib: cd ./lib/models && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../../
scripts.build:lib: cd ./lib/models && npm run build && npm link && cd ../client && npm run build && npm link && cd ../server && npm run build && npm link && cd ../../
scripts.build:backend: cd ./back-end/api && npm run build && npm run dist && cd ../realtime && npm run build && npm run dist
scripts.install:backend: cd back-end/api && npm install && cd ../realtime && npm install && cd ../../

scripts.setup: npm run install:lib && npm run build:lib && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
